窂字的基本解释

窂
láo
古同“牢”。

窂字的汉语字典释义

[①]［láo］
［《廣韻》魯刀切，平豪，來。］
(1)同“牢”。关养牲畜的栏圈。
(2)见“梟窂”。
(3)见“窂浪”。

窂字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【穴字部】　窂； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页864第01
【廣韻】魯刀切【集韻】朗刀切，?音牢。實也，與牢同。閑養牛馬圈也。【劉歆·遂初賦】天烈烈以厲高兮，寥?窻以梟窂。

窂字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
窂字的起名意思

暂无。

窂
Basic explanation of words
窂
láo
Gu Tong is "prison".
窂
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［láo］
["Guangyun" Lu knife cut, Pinghao, come. ]
(1) Same as "prison". A pen that keeps livestock.
(2) See "Xiaoyu".
(3) See "窂浪".
窂
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Collection] [Acupoint Word Department] 　窂; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 864 No. 01
[Guang Yun] Lu Knife Cut [Ji Yun] Lang Knife Cut, Sound Firm. Actually, same as prison. Freely raising cattle and horse pens. 【Liu Xin·Suichu Fu】Tian Lielie relies on sternness, but sparsely relies on Xiaoxiao.
